Translations.Text: Ni shuo:“Fengming zhuchi nimen de shengming de sishen, jiang shi nimen siwang, ranhou nimen jiang bei zhao guiyu nimen de zhu.”

Jiaruo ni de jian fanzui zhe zai tamen de zhu nali chuitousangqi de shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women yijing kanjianle, tingjianle, qiu ni rang women zhuan huiqu, women jiang zuo shanshi, women que shi quexinzhe.” Jiaruo ni kanjian zhe zhong qingzhuang……
Jiaruo wo yiyu, bi yi xiangdao fuyu mei geren, dan cong wo fachu de panci yi quedingle, wo bi yi jingling he renlei yiqi tian man huo yu
Nimen changshi ba! Yinwei nimen wangji jinri de xiang hui, wo que yi wangji nimenle. Nimen yinwei ziji de xingwei er changshi yongjiu de xingfa ba
Xinyang wo de jixiang de, zhiyou na deng ren; bieren yi wo de jixiang quan jie tamen de shihou, tamen bian fufu koutou bing zansong tamen di na chaojue wanwu de zhu, tamen bu gan wangzizunda,※
tamen le bu luo chuang, tamen yi kongju he xiwang de xinqing qidao tamen de zhu; tamen fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de
Renhe ren dou bu zhidao yi wei tamen zhucangle shenme weiji, yi baochou tamen de xingwei
Xindao zhe yu beini zhe yiyang ma? Tamen shi bu xiangdeng de
Zhiyu xindao erqie xingshan zhe, jianglai deyi leyuan wei guisu, na shi weile baochou tamen de xingwei de
Zhiyu beini zhe, tamen de guisu, zhishi huo yu, mei dang tamen yao xiang tao chu, dou bei lan huiqu. You shengyin dui tamen shuo:“Nimen changshi yiqian nimen suo fouren de huoxing ba!”
Zai zuida de xingfa zhiqian, wo bi shi tamen changshi zuijin de xingfa, yibian tamen huiwu
Youren yi zhu de jixiang quan jie ta, er ta bu ken tingcong, zheyang de ren, shei bi ta hai bu yi ne? Wo biran yao chengzhi fanzui de ren
Wo que yi ba jingdian shangci mu sa, suoyi ni duiyu jieshou jingdian, buyao xianyu youyu zhong, wo ceng yi na bu jingdian wei yiselie houyi de xiangdao
Wo ceng yi tamen zhong de yibufen renwei biaoshuai, dang tamen renshou jiannan, quexin wo de jixiang de shihou, feng wo de mingling qu yindao zhongren
Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu biding panjue tamen suo zhenglun de shifei
Nandao tamen hai bu xiaode ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, tamen changchang jingguo naxie ren de guxiang, zai nali que you xuduo jixiang. Tamen zenme bu tingcong ne
Tamen hai bu zhidao ma? Wo ba yushui gan dao wu cao di difang, er jie ta shengchu tamen de shengchu he tamen ziji suo shi de zhuangjia. Nandao tamen kan bujian ma
Tamen shuo:“Zhe zhong panjue shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.”
Ni shuo:“Buxindao zhe, zai panjue ri, sui xin wuyi, bingqie bu huode kuandai.”
Ni yingdang bi kai tamen, ni yingdang dengdai, tamen biding shi dengdai de.§
